title: U.S. Begins Airstrikes Against Iraqi Militants, With Narrow Aims
teaser: U.S. jet fighters have commenced airstrikes against the Islamist militant group known as the Islamic State. Meanwhile, American cargo planes have also begun humanitarian airdrops to support a minority religious community now surrounded by the group in the mountains of northern Iraq.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
